titles.title: We’re Here To Praise Our Savior (Suzie Holley Peterson)

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We’re here to sing our praises To Jesus the King of kings. To Him we lift our voices high And call upon His name. He’s given us life; He’s made us sons, He is our head; now we are one. We’re one, we’re one, we’re one, We’re one, we’re one —- Because of the wonderful Work He’s done. (Brothers-hold, Sisters-repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We’re here to praise our Savior, The wonderful Lord of all!{/lang-eng}
